nodes.text: Rho Squadron was an Imperial Navy squadron serving the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. They fought rogue Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin's splinter government fleet during the Zaarin insurrection. The squadron made use of Alpha-class Xg-1 Star Wing starfighters. At some point, the squadron was dispatched to an oceanic planet, with one member of the squadron releasing a barrage of missiles.
